mapper.sql: id, name, className, intervall, startTime, endTime, repeatTime, executeTime, status,systemCode, jkey, triggerType, cronExpression, MTime, CTime
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_JOB_CONFIG (id, name, className, intervall, startTime, endTime, repeatTime, executeTime, status, jkey, systemCode, triggerType, cronExpression, MTime, CTime ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intervall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repeattime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{executetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{systemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{triggertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cronexpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update SYS_JOB_CONFIG
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
className = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
intervall = #{intervall,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
repeatTime = #{repeattime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
executeTime = #{executetime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
jkey = #{jkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
systemCode = #{systemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
triggerType = #{triggertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cronExpression = #{cronexpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MTime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CTime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SYS_JOB_CONFIG set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, className = #{classname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intervall = #{intervall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startTime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repeatTime = #{repeattime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, executeTime = #{executetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jkey = #{jkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, systemCode = #{systemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, triggerType = #{triggertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cronExpression = #{cronexpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MTime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CTime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from SYS_JOB_CONFIG where status=1 and (endTime is null or endTime > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

select count(*) from SYS_JOB_CONFIG where 1 = 1
AND name like '%${name}%'
AND status=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND `jkey` like '%${jkey}%'
select jkey from SYS_JOB_CONFIG where className = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
